register.title: Register
register.description: Fill the form to create an account in BruxTest system.

medicalAddress.title: Medical facility address data
medicalAddress.description: Choose medical facilities under which you provide dental services.

form.confirmRequired: You have to accept the Terms and Conditions to register
form.isDifferentAddress: Delivery address is different than medical facility address
form.confirm: I confirm that I've read and I accept Terms and Conditions.

login.minlength: Your username is required to be at least 1 character.
login.maxlength: Your username cannot be longer than 50 characters.

messages.success: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.

error.userexists: Login name already registered! Please choose another one.
error.emailexists: Email is already in use! Please choose another one.

modal.title: Choose your role in the system
modal.testDescription:
After filling registration form you will have to

take a test to finalize the registration process.
